game.name: The Long Way Home
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 스테레오 사운드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You are alone on a drifting starship. No humans, only robots. As Miner 13-553; craft, farm, repair, upgrade skills and find your way home. Fight the machines or choose a peaceful path. Explore the mystery or just focus on the journey. The choice is yours.
